main event: A bright white light, shaped like an aircraft navigation light, approached the Columbia, Missouri airport at a high speed from the east. It suddenly climbed straight up into the 2,522 feet overcast and made no noise.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light, round in size, similar to an aircraft navigation light.
The object approached the Columbia, Missouri airport at a rapid speed.
The object suddenly climbed straight up into the 2,522 feet overcast.
The object made no noise during the sighting.
The sighting was reported by the Columbia, Missouri Air Force Reserve.
sighted object: a bright white light, shaped like an aircraft navigation light
witnesses: several people at the Columbia, Missouri airport
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
